QuestData.Title: Remnants of the Past
QuestData.Description: <The journal entry appears hastily written.>$B$BI do not know what has become of my village. Ever since the mists engulfed the harbor, my kinsfolk have changed.$B$BSome have grown violent and savage, while others have fallen into madness. Many have ventured into the mists and have yet to return.$B$BIn these times, we can usually turn to our leader, Jarl Tarben. Alas, the mists have taken him as well.$B$BI do not know what will become of me. For now, I can only stay at my post and remain vigilant.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate clues to discover the fate of Tideskorn Harbor.
QuestData.RewardText: The mists of this bay rot not only the wood of the ships, but the very souls of its inhabitants.$B$BBut it seems you have already discovered this.
